tns:patch.author: ginchauspe
tns:patch.description: Adding menu entries for AMP Offline

script.lang: UPDATE amp_menu_entry_view SET url = '/TEMPLATE/reamp/modules/ampoffline/download/index.html' WHERE url LIKE '/amp-offline'; UPDATE amp_menu_entry_view SET url = '/TEMPLATE/reamp/modules/ampoffline/download/index.html' WHERE url LIKE '/public-amp-offline';
